name: Text Detective Game
description:
This is a short detective text adventure for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 91. It is my first game ever published. Since I had a lot of time pressure you will find grammatical mistakes and potentially some bugs.  (Press the Full Screen Button)

I hope you enjoy the text puzzle game. 

First Update: Fixed camera ratio to match screen size.
